name: IO (itch)
description:
IO is a space-themed puzzle game based on a far away unexplored galaxy. The player controls IO, an alien-like being that uses sci-fi technology to explore and investigate worlds. IO is an E7-TIE ship explorer, and he has been assigned the job of exploring a recently discovered galaxy. Edwin, his guide, told him that on that galaxy’s worlds are the pieces of an ancient artifact, and IO has to get them. Take part in this epic journey and help IO explore the universe! 

Controls:

WASD or Joystick: Move

RMB or Left Trigger: Aim

LMB or Light Trigger: Shoot

E or A button: Interact, advance dialogue.

1, 2, 3, 4 or D-Pad: Change ammo
